group.label: Autosuggest
group.comment: Replace the built in Magento Autosuggest with Bloomreach Autosuggest

field.label: Css Selector
field.comment: Quicksearch input element class or id selector, eg: .search_input or #search_input

field.label: Custom Css
field.comment: We've designed the Autosuggest to be highly flexible with in the Magento

field.label: Autosuggest Rendering Template
field.comment: Template update date : Oct 20,2021. Please update your current template. If you have added any changes then copy current template in text editor and checked "Use system value" checkbox to load latest template then merge your changes.You can follow documentation link for more info.

field.label: Search Main Template update date
field.comment:
<script>
                    requirejs(['jquery', 'prototype'], function() {
                        jQuery(document).ready(function () {
                            $('row_bloomreach_search_autosuggest_search_autosuggest_template_update_date').hide();
                            var search_autosuggest_template_version_date = $('search_autosuggest_template_version_date').innerText;
                            var search_autosuggest_template_update_date = $('bloomreach_search_autosuggest_search_autosuggest_template_update_date').value;
                            if(new Date(search_autosuggest_template_version_date) > new Date(search_autosuggest_template_update_date)) {
                                $('bloomreach_search_autosuggest_main_template_text').next('p').show();
                            } else {
                                if(search_autosuggest_template_update_date=="") {
                                    $('bloomreach_search_autosuggest_main_template_text').next('p').show();
                                } else {
                                    $('bloomreach_search_autosuggest_main_template_text').next('p').hide();
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    });
                    </script>
